data.message: Hey facebook why my facebook layout is not changed  ? :(

replies.message: Hey Sheharyar.  We are rolling out the new design slowly while listening to audience feedback. Thanks for your patience. -Jenny
ok got it ! thanks :)
the new design is hectic.. change it to previous one or try a better one with wide news feed area..
Thanks for your feedback, Faraz.  Please let us know what you would change to make your experience more enjoyable here: http://on.fb.me/1m4k5BY. -Jenny
Jenny,  I need some help in retriving my company's information, but the system locked me out. However, I do not remember the information I used in opening the account. What do you suggest?
Thanks Facebook, i love my profile with new design <3 :)
facebook thanks so much for this new layout :) it is cool and i can easily chat with my family and my friend :D and it is faster
I don't like the new layout. The previous one was more elegant, and with breath (I mean aéré in french). Too many color and less readable is this one.
Hey Gbemi.  We're sorry to hear you're having trouble.  If you've lost access to your account, you can secure it here: http://on.fb.me/1fxftvC. -Jenny
Thanks for the compliment, Hady. We'll tell our product team to keep up the great work! - Kristen
Thank you Shqipron! We love that you love the new design. - Kristen
Facebook , Por que bloqueia 30 dias de enviar amizades? sendo que conheço as pessoas isso não deveria existir sinceramente

Hey Sona. We're sorry to hear that your friend is experiencing this issue. If they think their account was disabled by mistake they can submit an appeal in the Help Center at: http://on.fb.me/1fxmM6E -Kristen
Hi Isabelle. We'll take this feedback back to our team. If you have anymore suggestions please, let us know at: http://on.fb.me/1fxmMnb - Kristen
Ninguém fala a minha língua :D
please facebook this new design is really bad and boring, just make something better with news feed, i can't stay on facebook with that.
I have been on the waiting list for about a year now and I still don't have the new design yet. When will I get it? Will it be soon?
My Facebook layout didn't change , can you change it to the new one ?
Hey Facebook i dont share video pls help me
I still waiting for new look about half year, bud still nothing ... Can u say when you start my "new" facebook ? Thanks
Hi facebook.Can  you tell me why posts reach is down ? Will it get normal again ?
Still dont have the new layout of facebook. I already signed on that before 2013 ends.
Me Love Facebook
Hey Facebook will you please reset facebook pages reach ? we're getting low reach :/
i cant find where to log out??  HELP
